Impressed by the ancient Roman architecture. Walked around the Colosseum and treated myself to some delicious gelato.
Enjoyed the soft morning sun, visited the Royal Palace, and tried tapas for the first time!
A city full of structure and fascinating history, especially learning about the Berlin Wall.
Peaceful city with stunning Orthodox churches and charming architecture.
Rented a bike and rode through cute neighborhoods and scenic canals. Such a refreshing day!
Standing on the Acropolis, overlooking the whole city â€” felt like stepping back in time.
Wandered through Alfama while listening to Fado music and had the most amazing pastel de nata.
Saw cherry blossoms in Ueno Park, explored the streets of Asakusa, and had a steaming bowl of authentic ramen.
Food tour around Yaowarat Street and an evening boat ride on the Chao Phraya River. Unforgettable flavors and views!
